greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of A276150(d) over proper divisors d of n, where A276150 gives the sum of digits in primorial base.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: A276150(n) = { my(s=0, p=2, d); while(n, d = (n%p); s += d; n = (n-d)/p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (s); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 02 2018
